verbs.description: survivor of jewish federation shooting reacts to [V: pittsburgh] [ARG1: shooting] seattle is no stranger to violence against the jewish community in 2006 a man opened fire inside the belltown offices of the jewish federation of greater seattle one woman was killed and five other jewish federation judaism belltown deborah horne pittsburgh washington cheryl stumbo jewish federation of greater seattle kiro jewish community seattle sandy hook
